descriptors.text: Distant echoes reverberate through unseen passages
A far-off rumbling vibrates through the stone
Wind howls through distant openings
The steady drip of water echoes from somewhere far away
Thunder rolls in the distance
Deep within the caverns, water drips into underground pools
A mournful wind moans through distant tunnels
The distant flutter of bat wings echoes through the darkness
Rocks settle and shift in the deep places
The constant rumble of flowing lava vibrates through your feet
Distant steam vents hiss and roar
Rocks crack and groan under thermal stress
A deep, ominous roar emanates from below
The distant rattle of chains echoes through the corridors
Echoing footsteps sound from somewhere far away
A distant scream cuts through the silence
The grinding of stone on stone reverberates from below
Deep groaning sounds emanate from the foundations
A wolf howls somewhere in the distant wilderness
An owl's hoot echoes through the trees
Thunder rumbles over distant hills
The rush of a distant stream reaches your ears
Water drips steadily from the ceiling
Something creaks and groans nearby
Something skitters in the shadows just out of sight
Dust settles with soft whispers
An eerie silence hangs in the air
Water drips from stalactites into still pools
Your own breath echoes back from the walls
Pebbles shift and clatter underfoot
Cave insects chirp in hidden crevices
Leaves rustle in the gentle breeze
Birds sing in the branches overhead
Tree branches creak and sway
Something moves through the undergrowth nearby
Insects buzz and hum around you
A chorus of frogs fills the humid air
The constant drone of insects surrounds you
Stagnant water bubbles and gurgles
The ground squelches with every step
Something splashes in the murky water nearby
Ice creaks and groans beneath your feet
Cold wind whistles through ice formations
Snow crunches with each step you take
Icicles drip slowly in the cold
Your heartbeat pounds in your ears
Your ragged breathing fills the silence between blows
Blood rushes through your veins
Your enemy's snarling breath is close
